comments.comment: Our country has become a dumping land.

Dear Well dweller.. Please at least watch local news for clear understanding of what is happening. Do not watch only the news channel of your political preference. Watch other news also and compare what extra information they are providing. The whole country saw the marine conservation authority, NARA officers working and directing NAVY and ARMY to clearing. At least try to come out of the well in the 21st century.
